subject: Re: [junit] which jdk will work with JUnit on Redhat6.2?
msgSnippet: ... Add affected classes to excluded.properties. Or disable the TestCaseClassLoader completely by setting loader=false (I think) in the junit.properties file
messageBody:
--- Peter Bismuti <peterb@...> wrote:
>Could you please tell me to do that?

Add affected classes to excluded.properties. Or disable the
TestCaseClassLoader completely by setting "loader=false" (I think) in
the junit.properties file (which should be in user.home).

>Exactly which class needs to be added to the excluded.properties file?

Can't tell from the output. Could try excluding everything or disabling
dynamic loading completely as above.

Regards,

Rob
